synopsis.text: January 21, 2019 marks the beginning of an enchanting journey at Mysteria Academy, a renowned institution that fosters unity among humans, gods, and demons by teaching magic without prejudice. The anime "Mysteria Friends" follows the daily lives of two extraordinary students: Anne, a diligent princess and exemplary scholar, and Grea, a unique princess of half-dragon, half-human descent. As they navigate through their magical studies, the pair's contrasting personalities and backgrounds promise an engaging and captivating story. Originally adapted from the "Manaria Mahou Gakuin" event in the game "Rage of Bahamut," this anime invites viewers to join Anne and Grea in their mystical adventures at Mysteria Academy.
